enrolled-dateline.#text: Begun and held at the City of Washington on Friday, the third day of January, two thousand and fourteen

congress.#text: One Hundred Thirteenth Congress of the United States of America

official-title.#text: To enhance the ability of community financial institutions to foster economic growth and serve their communities, boost small businesses, increase individual savings, and for other purposes.

role.#text: Speaker of the House of Representatives.
Vice President of the United States and President of the Senate.

header.#text: Changes required to small bank holding company policy statement on assessment of financial and managerial factors

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#text: Board of Governors of the Federal Reserve System

text.#text: Before the end of the 6-month period beginning on the date of the enactment of this Act, the

quote.#tail: ) shall publish in the Federal Register proposed revisions to the Small Bank Holding Company Policy Statement on Assessment of Financial and Managerial Factors (12 CFR part 225 appendix C) that provide that the policy shall apply to bank holding companies and savings and loan holding companies which have pro forma consolidated assets of less than $1,000,000,000 and that—

text.#text: are not engaged in significant nonbanking activities either directly or through a nonbank subsidiary;
do not conduct significant off-balance sheet activities (including securitization and asset management or administration) either directly or through a nonbank subsidiary; and
do not have a material amount of debt or equity securities outstanding (other than trust preferred securities) that are registered with the

determines that such action is warranted for supervisory purposes.
